channel.title: Need help wit microphone and sound?!
channel.description: Hi guys i got this new laptop and i use msn and i call ppl alot but on my laptop when i call someone it becomes all messed up like i repeat and it sounds like i am on a dj's turn table lol.... it is reall annoyin, anyone any ideas????

item.title: Need help wit microphone and sound?!

item.description:
@dannytuite wrote:

i fixed the problem i got realtak audio latest drivers
